charges.charge_description: CONSPIRACY TO POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 60 Months Concurrently to Cts 2 and 4, but consecutive to Ct 3 for a total of 120 Months; 5 Years SRT; $100 SA; Deft shall not commit any further crimes; Deft shall not possess a firearm; Deft shall participate in the collection of DNA as requested by the Probation Dept; If deported Deft shall not re-enter the country illegally. Notice of Right to Appeal Advised on the Record.

charges.charge_description: CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE(2)

charges.charge_disposition: 60 Months Concurrently to 1 and 4 but consecutive to Count 3 for a total of 120 months ; 5 Years SRT; $100 SA; Deft shall not commit any further crimes; Deft shall not possess a firearm; Deft shall participate in the collection of DNA as requested by the Probation Dept; If deported Deft shall not re-enter the country illegally. Notice of Right to Appeal Advised on the Record.

charges.charge_description: USING/CARRYING A FIREARM DURING COMMISSION OF A DRUG TRAFFICKING CRIME OF VIOLENCE(3)

charges.charge_disposition: 60 Months Consecutive to 1,2 and 4 for a total of 120 months ; 5 Years SRT; $100 SA; Deft shall not commit any further crimes; Deft shall not possess a firearm; Deft shall participate in the collection of DNA as requested by the Probation Dept; If deported Deft shall not re-enter the country illegally. Notice of Right to Appeal Advised on the Record.

charges.charge_description: POSSESSION OF A FIREARM BY AN ALIEN(4)

charges.charge_disposition: 60 Months Consecutive to counts 1 and 2 but concurrently to Ct 3 for a total of 120 months; 3 Years SRT; $100 SA; Deft shall not commit any further crimes; Deft shall not possess a firearm; Deft shall participate in the collection of DNA as requested by the Probation Dept; If deported Deft shall not re-enter the country illegally. Notice of Right to Appeal Advised on the Record.

charges.charge_description: CONSPIRACY TO POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 57 Months as to Count 1 and 57 Months as to Count 2; concurrently; 3 Years SRT; Concurrently; $100 SA as to Counts 1 and 2 for a total of $200.00; Deft shall not commit any further crimes; Deft shall participate in the collection DNA as requested by the probation department; Deft shall not possess a firearm; Deft shall re-enter the country illegally. Notice of Right to appeal advised on the record.

charges.charge_description: CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE(2)

charges.charge_disposition: 57 Months as to Count 1 and 57 Months as to Count 2; concurrently; 3 Years SRT; Concurrently; $100 SA as to Counts 1 and 2 for a total of $200.00; Deft shall not commit any further crimes; Deft shall participate in the collection DNA as requested by the probation department; Deft shall not possess a firearm; Deft shall re-enter the country illegally. Notice of Right to appeal advised on the record.
